sn35.124:1: On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling at Vesalī in the Great Wood in the Hall with the Peaked Roof. Then the householder Ugga of Vesalī approached the Blessed One … and said to him….[n.3] AtAN I 26,he is declared the foremost male lay disciple among those who offer agreeable things(etadagganaṁ manāpadāyakānaṃ); see tooAN IV 208–2.
